definitions.definition: the process of using a court to settle an argument or to deal with a complaint

examples.text: There was enough evidence to bring **criminal proceedings** against her.
The EU has started legal proceeedings against the country for its failure to implement the directive.

definitions.definition: an event or a series of actions

examples.text: The Mayor will open the proceedings at the City Hall tomorrow.
We watched the proceedings from the balcony.

definitions.definition: the official written report of a meeting, etc.

examples.text: His paper is published in the new issue of the proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.
